abstract: Venture for America's goal is to staff start-ups, train entrepreneurs - and create 100,000 jobs by 2025.
snippet: Venture for America's goal is to staff start-ups, train entrepreneurs - and create 100,000 jobs by 2025.
lead_paragraph: Each spring, well-heeled recruiters from financial and consulting firms lay siege to college campuses. They wine and dine the best and brightest students, siphoning future leaders off the top of the talent pool.

headline.main: Starting a Teach for America for Entrepreneurs
